mapper.select: SELECT wsq.task_id, wt.task_name, wsq.script_id, ws.title, SUM(wssc.stu_orderly) + SUM(wspc.par_orderly) + CASE WHEN (SUM(wssc.stu_orderly) + SUM(wspc.par_orderly) = 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS orderly, SUM(wssc.stu_relation) + SUM(wspc.par_relation) + CASE WHEN (SUM(wssc.stu_relation) + SUM(wspc.par_relation) = 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS relation, CASE WHEN (SUM(wssc.stu_orderly) + SUM(wspc.par_orderly) + CASE WHEN (SUM(wssc.stu_orderly) + SUM(wspc.par_orderly) = 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END > 0) AND (SUM(wssc.stu_relation) + SUM(wspc.par_relation) + CASE WHEN (SUM(wssc.stu_relation) + SUM(wspc.par_relation) = 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END > 0) THEN '結局一' WHEN (SUM(wssc.stu_orderly) + SUM(wspc.par_orderly) + CASE WHEN (SUM(wssc.stu_orderly) + SUM(wspc.par_orderly) = 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END > 0) AND (SUM(wssc.stu_relation) + SUM(wspc.par_relation) + CASE WHEN (SUM(wssc.stu_relation) + SUM(wspc.par_relation) = 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END < 0) THEN '結局二' WHEN (SUM(wssc.stu_orderly) + SUM(wspc.par_orderly) + CASE WHEN (SUM(wssc.stu_orderly) + SUM(wspc.par_orderly) = 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END < 0) AND (SUM(wssc.stu_relation) + SUM(wspc.par_relation) + CASE WHEN (SUM(wssc.stu_relation) + SUM(wspc.par_relation) = 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END < 0) THEN '結局三' WHEN (SUM(wssc.stu_orderly) + SUM(wspc.par_orderly) + CASE WHEN (SUM(wssc.stu_orderly) + SUM(wspc.par_orderly) = 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END < 0) AND (SUM(wssc.stu_relation) + SUM(wspc.par_relation) + CASE WHEN (SUM(wssc.stu_relation) + SUM(wspc.par_relation) = 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END > 0) THEN '結局四' ELSE '其他結局' END AS result FROM wa_script_question wsq JOIN wa_task wt ON wt.task_id = wsq.task_id JOIN wa_script ws ON ws.script_id =wsq.script_id JOIN wa_script_detail wsd ON wsd.script_id = wsq.script_id AND wsd.period = wsq.period JOIN wa_script_parent_config wspc ON wspc.id = wsq.par_ans JOIN wa_script_student_config wssc ON wssc.id = wsq.stu_ans GROUP BY wsq.task_id, wsq.script_id ORDER BY script_id, task_id;

SELECT wsq.task_id, wt.task_name, wsq.period, wsq.script_id, ws.title, wsd.stu_content, wssc.stu_description, SUM(wssc.stu_orderly) AS stu_orderly, SUM(wssc.stu_relation) AS stu_relation, wsd.par_content, wspc.par_description, SUM(wspc.par_orderly) AS par_orderly, SUM(wspc.par_relation) AS par_relation FROM wa_script_question wsq JOIN wa_task wt ON wt.task_id = wsq.task_id JOIN wa_script ws ON ws.script_id =wsq.script_id JOIN wa_script_detail wsd ON wsd.script_id = wsq.script_id AND wsd.period = wsq.period JOIN wa_script_parent_config wspc ON wspc.id = wsq.par_ans JOIN wa_script_student_config wssc ON wssc.id = wsq.stu_ans GROUP BY wsq.task_id, wsq.period, wsq.script_id, wsd.stu_content, wssc.stu_description, wsd.par_content, wspc.par_description ORDER BY script_id ,task_id , period ;
